NeedDef.label: royal jelly
NeedDef.description: The total amount of royal jelly a Vivi eats affects how it grows. If a Vivi is fully fed by the time it grows up, it becomes a Royal Vivi; if not, it stays a regular Vivi. \nRoyal vivis can reproduce, have high social ability and psychic sensitivity, and possess several unique abilities, but their work capability is low.
